meanings.definition: The part of the female reproductive system that connects the uterus to the outside of the body.
meanings.sent1: Doctors study vaginas to understand how they function.
meanings.sent2: She felt discomfort in her vaginas and decided to see a gynecologist.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that vaginas have a secret language only they understand.
meanings.sent4: Her courage was like the strength of a thousand vaginas, unyielding and powerful.
meanings.sent5: In the dim light, the intricate details of the vaginas were revealed during the anatomy class.

meanings.definition: The external opening of the female reproductive system.
meanings.sent1: Mothers teach their daughters to care for their vaginas from a young age.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her vaginas carefully during the routine check-up.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed curious about the vaginas of the female dog next door.
meanings.sent4: The key to success was hidden within the mysterious depths of her vaginas.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of nature was evident in the delicate petals surrounding the vaginas of the flower.
